articles.description: Follow live text, in-play video clips and radio commentary as India play England in the Men's Cricket World Cup 2023.
articles.title: World Cup: England win toss and bowl first against unbeaten hosts India

articles.description: Nottingham Panthers' Adam Johnson dies after suffering a cut to his neck from a skate in a Challenge Cup match against the Sheffield Steelers.
articles.title: Ice hockey player Johnson dies after neck cut

articles.description: For South Africa, a country short on good news stories, losing the Rugby World Cup final and letting down 62m people was unthinkable.
articles.title: 'New Zealand wanted the win, South Africa needed it'

articles.description: WBC heavyweight champion Tyson Fury claims a controversial split decision victory against former UFC heavyweight champion Francis Ngannou.
articles.title: Fury claims controversial split decision win over Ngannou

articles.description: Liverpool say they are "aware of an ongoing situation" involving the family of Luis Diaz after reports his parents have been kidnapped in Colombia.
articles.title: Liverpool 'aware' of ongoing Diaz family situation

articles.description: New Zealand captain Sam Cane says his red card in the Rugby World Cup final defeat by South Africa is something he will have to "live with forever".
articles.title: Red card something I will live with forever - Cane

articles.description: Watch as David Willey claims the key wicket of Virat Kohli who chips to Ben Stokes as England make a strong start in the field against India at the Cricket World Cup.
articles.title: 'England right on top!' - Kohli chips to Stokes off Willey

articles.description: With both Harry Kane and Jude Bellingham lighting up their leagues, who else in world football can claim to have had a better start to the season?
articles.title: Are 'stupendous' Bellingham & record-breaker Kane world's best?

articles.description: Charles Leclerc leads Carlos Sainz to a sensational and surprising Ferrari one-two in qualifying for the Mexico City Grand Prix.
articles.title: Ferrari's Leclerc takes surprise Mexico City pole

articles.description: The Manchester derby is not a foregone conclusion given the air of uncertainty hanging over both clubs, writes Simon Stone.
articles.title: 'Air of uncertainty' before Manchester derby
